game.name: MegaMan X8 Demake 16bit
game.desc: The Mega Man X8 16-Bit Demake is a fan-made project that reimagines the original "Mega Man X8" in the style of the classic 16-bit era. This demake brings the modern aesthetics and mechanics of the original game into a retro environment reminiscent of the SNES era, particularly the earlier Mega Man X titles on that system.
